Articles.Content:
Well I'll begin to introduce myself, I come from a dark crater on Mun and I tend to wander on the forums once and a while. I like KSP because it's more educational than any game I've ever played, plus I like floating in space.

Alright that's it for now

Welcome to the forums!

I think I remember you from the IRC channel, if you're the same lokee I think you are. Don't be afraid to ask questions, and make yourself at home!
Have Fun! Take some time and look at this > http://www.youtube.com/user/szyzyg Only person you need.
